value.title: Facebook's AI team expands post-grad courses for Black and Latinx students
value.excerpt: Facebook says that it will expand an online course in deep learning to more students to help improve the diversity of its AI division. After a successful pilot program at Georgia Tech, the company will roll out this graduate-level course in deep learning to more colleges across 2021.
